description: Princess-Quality requests bug fixes from Princess-Dev after QA validation finds issues

failing_tests.name: test_token_expiration
failing_tests.error: AssertionError: Token should expire after 1 hour

issues.suggested_fix: Verify exp claim in JWT validation
Implement refresh token rotation per RFC 6749

issues.description: Invalid grant type returns 500 instead of 400
issues.suggested_fix: Add input validation before processing

drone_assignments.task: Fix error handling for invalid grant type

expected_coordination_message.description: CRITICAL: Fix 2 security vulnerabilities in GraphQL API

issues.description: SQL injection vulnerability in user search resolver
issues.vulnerable_code: query = f"SELECT * FROM users WHERE name LIKE '%{search_term}%'"
issues.suggested_fix: Use parameterized queries or ORM methods
Add @requires_auth decorator to subscription resolvers

drone_assignments.task: Fix SQL injection with parameterized queries

issues.suggested_fix: Extract helper functions to reduce LOC

issues.description: 2 functions missing assertions in critical paths
issues.suggested_fix: Add assertions to validate inputs and invariants

expected_coordination_message.description: Fix performance issues in Elasticsearch search

issues.root_cause: Inefficient query construction, missing index hints
issues.suggested_fix: Optimize query structure, add index hints, reduce fields fetched

issues.root_cause: Loading entire result set into memory
issues.suggested_fix: Implement pagination and streaming for large result sets

expected_coordination_message.description: Improve error handling and reduce duplication

issues.description: 3 critical paths missing proper error handling

files.issue: No retry logic for network errors

issues.suggested_fix: Add specific exception handling, retry logic, and idempotency

issues.description: 2 instances of duplicated payment validation logic
issues.suggested_fix: Extract common validation logic to shared utility function

success_criteria: All critical paths have proper error handling

drone_assignments.task: Add error handling and retry logic
Fix memory leak in connection cleanup

context.feature: Multi-tenant data isolation with RLS policies

expected_coordination_message.description: CRITICAL: Fix tenant data leakage vulnerability

issues.description: Tenant context not enforced in admin queries
issues.suggested_fix: Enforce tenant_id in all queries, even for admin users
issues.impact: Admin users can access data from other tenants

expected_coordination_message.description: Memory leak still present after initial fix

issues.description: Memory leak persists despite initial fix
issues.root_cause: Worker threads not properly cleaned up
issues.suggested_fix: Use context managers for worker lifecycle, explicitly call join() and cleanup()

expected_coordination_message.description: Fix path traversal and file type bypass vulnerabilities

issues.suggested_fix: Use secure_filename() and validate against whitelist

issues.description: File type validation can be bypassed
issues.vulnerable_code: Only checking file extension, not content
issues.suggested_fix: Use magic bytes validation in addition to extension check

expected_coordination_message.description: Fix tamper detection and log rotation

issues.root_cause: Making 3 Redis calls per request instead of 1
issues.suggested_fix: Use Redis Lua script to combine operations

expected_coordination_message.description: Fix 4 validation regressions in common utilities

issues.vulnerable_code: Subject and To fields accept newlines
issues.suggested_fix: Sanitize headers, reject newlines and special characters

issues.description: Page beyond limit returns empty instead of error

drone_assignments.task: Add validation for negative page and beyond limit

issues.root_cause: No query result caching, inefficient aggregations
issues.suggested_fix: Add Redis caching for popular queries, optimize aggregations

success_criteria: Cache hit rate >60% for popular queries

issues.suggested_fix: Use AES-256-GCM for authenticated encryption

issues.root_cause: Still making separate queries for nested relationships
issues.suggested_fix: Add prefetch_related for nested relationships

issues.suggested_fix: Prefix dangerous characters with single quote

issues.suggested_fix: Regenerate session ID after successful login

issues.suggested_fix: Encrypt session data before storing in Redis
